title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get the following message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. BTW, what does the message mean?
OB: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get the following message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
EB: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), I expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars.
SR:
1. Open a binary project selection, e.g. org.apache.ant.
2. Press F4 to view the type hierarchy.
3. Observe the message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
